tool_description: Analyzes the contextual usage patterns of words in historical texts, identifying semantic domains, collocations, and pragmatic functions.

word.description: The word to analyze for contextual usage patterns

text_passages.description: Array of text passages containing the word in context

analysis_depth.description: Depth of analysis: basic, detailed, comprehensive

window_size.description: Number of words before and after target word to analyze (1-20)

error_messages: Word not found in passages: The specified word does not appear in any provided text passages.
Insufficient context data: Provide at least one text passage containing the target word.
Too many passages: Limit text_passages to 500 entries maximum.
Invalid analysis depth: Use one of [basic, detailed, comprehensive].
Window size out of range: Set window_size between 1 and 20.
Empty text passages: Remove any empty strings from the text_passages array.
usage: Provide the target word and array of text_passages. Optionally set analysis_depth and window_size to control the scope of contextual analysis.

semantic_domains.description: Identified semantic domains where the word appears

frequent_collocations.description: Most frequent words appearing near the target word

grammatical_patterns.description: Common grammatical constructions involving the word

usage_frequencies.description: Relative frequency scores for different usage patterns

context_summary.description: Summary of the word's primary contextual usage patterns
